title: Gifted skin not received
body: I gifted my friend a skin and she hasn't gotten it yet.  Kinda curious why since they usually receive it the next time they log in.  It's in my gifting history and everything.  Please help. :)

replies.body: I can see on my end that some skins were sent recently, which one in particular did you think didn't go through?
The Sherwood forest Ashe?  She claims she never got a notification or the message I sent with it.

That's the one! Could you have your friend check her collection and take a quick screenshot showing it locked for me if she can't use it? I'm seeing it on her account as we speak, and that might be some weird visual bug if that's the case!
She got it!  Apparently she just didn't get any sort of notification or the message I sent with it.  Weird.  Alas, all is well.  Thanks for the help!
